articles.content: Amazon Great Freedom Festival 2021: The e-commerce major is hosting the Great Freedom Festival sale on its platform in India. It started on August 5 and it will go on until August 11. During the cour… [+1146 chars]

articles.author: Tech Desk
articles.title: WhatsApp finally adds disappearing photos feature: How to use it - The Indian Express
articles.description: Whatsapp disappearing photos feature: When you send a photo using the ‘View Once' feature, then it will disappear once the receiver opens it and leaves the chat.
articles.content: WhatsApp has finally added the disappearing photos feature to the stable version of the app. The feature is known as View Once’ and is similar to how Instagrams expiring media feature works. When you… [+2130 chars]
